description: Simplified disease presentation status at sample collection, New diagnosis or Relapse
Numeric risk score. This fields is a catchall for various types of patient risk stratification. More information about the scoring technique in next column (D_Risk_Score_Type)
Specify. This field is not restricted to a curated set of responses.
M2GEN: AIDSDiagnosisInd: Indicates if patient has AIDS; COPDDiagnosisInd: Indicates if patient has Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease; CVAStrokeDiagnosisInd: Indicates if patient had Cerebrovascular Accident ; DementiaDiagnosisInd: Indicates if patient has Dementia; RenalFailureDiagnosisInd: Indicates if patient has any Renal failure; HepaticInsufficiencyDiagnosisInd: Indicates if patient has any Hepatic insufficiency; InsulinDependentDiabetesMellitusDiagnosisInd: Indicates if patient has Insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus; HypertensionDiagnosisInd: Indicates if patient has Hypertension; MIHeartFailureDiagnosisInd: Indicates if patient had Heart failure or Myocardial Infarction; NonSkinCancerLastFiveYearsDiagnosisInd: Records if the patient has had any Non-Skin cancer in the last five years; NeurotoxicityDrugToxicityInd: Records if the patient has had any drug related toxicity- Neurotoxicity; VenousThrombosisDrugToxicityInd: Records if the patient has had any drug related toxicity- Venous Thrombosis; LiverDrugToxicityInd: Records if the patient has had any drug related toxicity- Liver; KidneyDrugToxicityInd: Records if the patient has had any drug related toxicity- Kidney; FatigueDrugToxicityInd: Records if the patient has had any drug related toxicity- Fatigue; UnknownNotPerformedDrugToxicityInd: Records if the patient has had any drug related toxicity- Unknown; HadSurgeryBiopsyInd: Records if patient has had any prior surgeries/biopsies (Therapeutic, Diagnostic etc.); OnDrugTrialInd: Records if the patient is on any clinical trial; TreatAtYourFacilityInd: Records if the patient is being treated at the facility where the TCC study is being conducted; TreatmentMedicationInd: Records if the patient has received any treatment; RadiationTherapyInd: Records if the patient has received any Radiation; ImagingRadiologyScansInd: Records  if the patient has any imaging tests/scans; TumorBiomarkerTestPerformedInd: Records if the patient has any Tumor Biomarker tests; TumorSequencingPerformedInd: Records if the patient has any Tumor Sequence tests

description: Is there a family history of cancer?
M2GEN: FamilyHistory:: group_by(Celgene.Patient.ID) %>%  summarise(D_Family_Cancer_History = as.numeric(any( FamilyRelation != "No Family History Of Cancer")))

description: Did the patient have observable bone disease at the beginning of the trial?
M2GEN:
auto_read(wb, sheet = "Imaging") %>%
  filter( ImagingModalityMethod == "Bone Scan") %>%
  group_by(Celgene.Patient.ID) %>%
  summarise(D_Bone_Disease = as.numeric(any(EvidenceOfLesion == "Yes")))

description: Overall Survival time: number of days from (trial randomization or diagnosis) to (death or last assessment).
Was death observed within the first 18 months after trial randomization of diagnosis?
Progression-free survival: number of days from (trial randomization or diagnosis) to (disease progression, death, or last assessment).
Has the patient developed progressive disease or death since the last assessment date?
Was progression or death observed within the first 18 months after trial randomization of diagnosis?
Did the patient complete the study. For MMRF only patients that have died of lost to follow up are marked as 0="No" since the study has not yet completed.
